<Text: Chuck Berry on Stage is an album by Chuck Berry, released in 1963 by Chess Records.>
Triplets:<Chuck Berry
1:
--------------------
Text: Chuck Berry on Stage:  Although promoted as a live album, it is a collection of previously released studio recordings (except for 5 songs..."All Aboard", "Trick or Treat", "I Just Want To Make Love To You", "Still Got The Blues", and a previously unreleased alternate take of "Brown-Eyed Handsome Man") with overdubbed audience sounds to simulate a live recording.
